item.name: Get Personal Discount Codes by Phone Number

request.description:
Get all personal discount codes for a customer by phone number. Access is controlled by RBAC:
- SUPERADMIN, ADMIN, API_USER: Full access to all personal codes
- COMPANY_USER: Can view codes generated by their company or their own codes
- STORE_USER: Can view codes generated by their store's company or their own codes
- Users can always view their own personal codes (when phoneNumber matches their mobilePhoneNumber)
